Name: Trawel
About the game: Trawel is an open world text adventure . What does that mean? It means that it's a text adventure with a world filled with locations for you to explore, partly handmade, partly procedurally generated. It's not everyone's cup of tea, but if you're looking for a romanticized, modern version of classic text adventures, look no further! Explore a open world full of different locations, fighting various enemies while continuously looting them for better equipment.
